description: Bounty hunter Christian Wilde caught a small time drug trafficker Sebastian Keys in Mexico. He keeps Sebastian in a private run-down prison until he collects the bounty. Going for the bigger fish, Christian decides to interrogate his captive for the name of his boss for an even larger bounty. Sebastian endures a harsh body cavity search, cbt, tt, corporal and not to mention his ass gets violated by a night stick.
title: The Bounty Hunter
